author: MalMaclean
title: 20th Wedding Anniversay Treat March 2017
text:
I booked this 3-day trip as a surprise for my wife for our 20th wedding anniversary - my wife knew nothing about it until we got to Heathrow on the Tuesday morning. The room was large and comfortable and the view over the park spectacular. The location just across the road from Central Park was perfect. The staff at the Ritz-Carlton were totally charming and did everything they could to make our stay special and memorable - nothing was too much trouble for them and we were always greeted with a smile. Special thanks to the concierges Maria and Timothy, Al the doorman, Yolanda in Housekeeping and all of the Reception and door staff, who provided us with guidance on where to go and how to get there for all of the places we visited during our short stay in New York. I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
